meanings.sent1: The company decided to reissue the product with updated features.
meanings.sent2: The record label will reissue the classic album on vinyl next month.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled coffee on the document, so I had to reissue it.
meanings.sent4: The teacher had to reissue the assignment because the original instructions were unclear.
meanings.sent5: To ensure accuracy, the bank will reissue the statement with corrected information.

meanings.definition: A new issue of something previously published or released
meanings.sent1: The reissue of the book includes bonus content for readers.
meanings.sent2: Fans were excited about the reissue of the limited edition sneakers.
meanings.sent3: The library's reissue of the popular magazine sold out quickly.
meanings.sent4: The reissue of the movie in 3D brought a new audience to the theaters.
meanings.sent5: Collectors eagerly awaited the reissue of the rare stamp for their collections.
